sense.def:
The Gospels
so štiri knjige svetega pisma, ki opisujejo življenje in nauke Jezusa Kristusa.

A gospel
je tudi zbirka idej, v katere nekdo zelo močno verjame.

seg.quote: They continue to preach their gospel of self-reliance.

sense.def:
To regard something as gospel
ali
to regard something as gospel truth
pomeni močno verjeti, da je nekaj resnično.

seg.quote: You can take it as gospel truth that he is busy.
